text: Unhon ne jawab diya “aey shoaib, teri bahut si baatein to hamari samajh hi mein nahin aati. Aur hum dekhte hain ke tu hamare darmiyan ek be-zoar aadmi hai. Teri biradari na hoti to hum kabhi ka tujhey sangsaar (stone to death) kar chuke hotey, tera balboota to itna nahin hai ke humpar bhari ho”
